answers.answer: Are there disadvantages to the Tecnis aspheric or Tecnis toric lens?  My concern with the acrysof lens is the reports of glistening and posterior opacification.   I read that diabetes enhances these risks.

Read my article on Today's Pulse below or follow this link:http://www.medhelp.org/user_journals/show/841991/Consider-ALL-the-Options-Before-Your-Cataract-Surgery-Working-Through-Whats-Best-For-Youdiabetes does not increase risk of glistening (which is not a problem) or posterior capsular opacification which is easily handled if it develops.JCH MD

question: Is the surgical risk different between these two lenses?
title: Tecnis toric vs Acrysof toric lens
